name: MenuItem
description: For use within an sp-menu element, a menu-item represents a single item in a menu.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Whether the menu item is active or has an active descendant

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: Causes the browser to treat the linked URL as a download.

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: Whether the menu item has keyboard focus

attributes.name: has-submenu
attributes.description: Whether the menu item has a submenu

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: The URL that the hyperlink points to.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: An accessible label that describes the component. It will be applied to aria-label, but not visually rendered.

attributes.name: no-wrap
attributes.description: Whether menu item text content should not wrap

attributes.name: referrerpolicy
attributes.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: The relationship of the linked URL as space-separated link types.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Whether the menu item is selected

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context (a tab, window, or iframe).

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the menu item which is used for selection

slots.name: default
slots.description: Text content to display within the Menu Item

slots.name: description
slots.description: Description to be placed below the label of the Menu Item

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Icon element to be placed at the start of the Menu Item

slots.name: value
slots.description: Content placed at the end of the Menu Item like values, keyboard shortcuts, etc.

events.name: blur
events.description: Fired when the menu item loses focus

events.name: focus
events.description: Fired when the menu item receives focus

events.name: sp-menu-item-added
events.description: Announces the item has been added so a parent menu can take ownership

events.name: click
events.description: Fired when the menu item is clicked

ariaAttributes.name: aria-disabled
ariaAttributes.description: Set to 'true' when the menu item is disabled

ariaAttributes.name: aria-selected
ariaAttributes.description: Set to 'true' when the menu item is selected

ariaAttributes.name: aria-label
ariaAttributes.description: Set from the label attribute when provided

ariaAttributes.name: aria-haspopup
ariaAttributes.description: Set to 'true' when the menu item has a submenu

ariaAttributes.name: aria-expanded
ariaAttributes.description: Set to 'true' when the submenu is open

examples.title: Selected Menu Item
examples.description: A menu item in selected state

examples.title: Disabled Menu Item
examples.description: A menu item that cannot be interacted with

examples.title: Menu Item with Icon
examples.description: A menu item with an icon

examples.title: Menu Item with Description
examples.description: A menu item with additional descriptive text

examples.title: Menu Item with Value
examples.description: A menu item with a value displayed at the end

examples.title: Menu Item with Submenu
examples.description: A menu item that opens a submenu
